column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My favorite dishes on the menu (I've tried basically everything!) are the patatas bravas (best I've ever had outside of Spain)
column4: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column5: spinach & manchego stuffed mushrooms.... I could go on and on. Â That's why it's best to go with a large group
column6: so you don't feel weird ordering 12 dishes (though I've gone with one other person before and done it... you'll just have a lot of leftovers!).
